habit.text: Complete Positive Habits to earn gold and experience! Negative Habits will hurt your avatar if you tap them, so avoid them in real life!

daily.text: Danger! These repeating tasks will hurt your avatar if you don't complete them in time. If you defeat them, you'll gain gold and experience!

todo.text: When you defeat your To-Dos by completing them in real life, your avatar will earn GOLD and EXPERIENCE so you can earn Rewards and unlock features!

reward.text: These are your Rewards! Earn gold by completing real-world Habits, Dailies, and To-Dos. Then spend it on in-game Rewards or custom real-world Rewards!

party.text: This is where you and your friends can hold each other accountable to your goals and fight monsters with your tasks!

pets.text: As you complete real-world tasks, you now have a random chance of finding eggs and potions. Combine them to hatch pets

skills.text: Skills are special abilities that have powerful affects! Tap on a skill to use it. It will cost Mana (the blue bar), which you earn by checking in every day and by completing your real-life tasks. Check out the FAQ in the menu for more info!

classes.text: Choose to become a Warrior, Mage, Healer, or Rogue! Each class has unique equipment and skills. Tap the (?) to learn more!

tavern.text: Welcome to the Tavern, a public, all-ages chatroom! Here you can chat about productivity and ask questions. Have fun!

equipment.text: When you buy equipment, it appears here. Your Battle Gear affects your stats, and your Costume (if enabled) affects what your avatar wears.

items.text: Earn items by completing tasks and leveling up. Tap on an item to use it!
